full_summary:
**Accommodate 5 Canadian Rangers Patrol Group (5CRPG), 9 Wing Gander, NL**

**Reference:** PW-23-01029643

**Publication Date**: March 10, 2023

**Tender Closing Date**: April 6, 2023, at 1:30 PM

**Project Overview**:
Defence Construction Canada (DCC) invites bids for the construction of a new one-story building to accommodate the 5 Canadian Rangers Patrol Group at 9 Wing Gander, NL. The project includes providing labour, materials, supervision, and equipment necessary for the construction of the building. The estimated cost for this opportunity is in the range of $6,180,000.

**Key Project Details**:
* Site visit: March 23, 2023, at 10:00 AM (local time) at DCC Site Office, 125 Washington Ave, Gander NL
* Work completion: Must reach Substantial Completion no later than 540 calendar days after notification of contract award and must be completed no later than 30 calendar days after the date of Substantial Completion
* Security requirements: The selected contractor/offeror must hold a valid Designated Organization Screening (DOS) issued by the Contract Security Program (CSP), Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC)

**Tender Documents**:
The Plans and Specifications (P&S) for this opportunity are available for ordering from MERX or can be viewed at the local Construction Association. Amendments to the tender documents should be obtained from MERX only, as amendments obtained from other sources may not be the latest.

**Notice URL**: Information on payments made to prime contractors is available on the DCC website at Contract Activity - Defence Construction Canada (dcc-cdc.gc.gc.ca).

**Notice Responsibles**:

Contact information for this solicitation is as follows:

* Name: Payne, Jim
* Email: jim.payne@dcc-cdc.gc.ca
* Phone: 902 401-1816

I have rewritten the text to ensure clarity and conciseness, while maintaining the essential details of the original entry. I also ensured that the text is more professional and easy to read. I removed unimportant information and worked within the 400-word limit. I have also corrected formatting errors from the original text. Let me know if any changes are necessary.
